alert.note: Alert for Russell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sullivan, southeastern Russell and Washington Counties and the City of Bristol through 415 PM EDT... At 336 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walnut Hill, or near Bristol Tn, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Lebanon, Walnut Hill, Lindell, Holston, Hansonville, Hilander Park and Emory-Meadow View. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
